eu.fbk.dkm.springles.base

Class ContextEnforcingTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.collect.ForwardingObject
      • eu.fbk.dkm.springles.base.ForwardingTransaction
        • eu.fbk.dkm.springles.base.ContextEnforcingTransaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Transaction

    final class ContextEnforcingTransaction
extends ForwardingTransaction
    A Transaction decorator reformulating operations targeted at the null context and preventing writing to inferred contexts.

    This class checks the contexts supplied at the API level and performs two functions: (1) it re-targets read and write operations addressing the null context to its named replacement and (2) prevents writing (add, remove and update operations) to inferred contexts. Note that a third context-related enforcing operation - namely, blocking access to inferred statements and contexts when forward inference is not demanded - is not implemented here but is demanded to the inference logic on the store side, as it is closely related to backward reasoning support.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • rewrite

        private org.openrdf.model.Resource[] rewrite(org.openrdf.model.Resource[] contexts)
        Rewrites the contexts in the supplied array, replacing the null context with nullContextURI. The input array is not changed and is returned in case rewriting is unnecessary.
        Parameters:
        contexts - the array of context identifiers to be rewritten
        Returns:
        the rewritten contexts array
        See Also:
        Contexts.rewrite(Resource[], Resource)

      • rewriteAndFilter

        private org.openrdf.model.Resource[] rewriteAndFilter(org.openrdf.model.Resource[] contexts)
        Rewrites and filters the supplied context array, replacing the null context with nullContextURI and removing inferred contexts. A warning message is logged in case removal occurs. The input array is not changed.
        Parameters:
        contexts - the context array to rewrite and filter
        Returns:
        the resulting context array, possibly the input array unchanged
        See Also:
        Contexts.rewriteAndFilter(Resource[], Resource, com.google.common.base.Predicate, String)

      • rewriteAndFilter

        private Iterable<org.openrdf.model.Statement> rewriteAndFilter(Iterable<? extends org.openrdf.model.Statement> iterable)
        Rewrites and filters the supplied statements, moving statements in the null context to context nullContextURI and removing statements in inferred contexts. The method wraps the supplied iterable, so to filter and rewrite statements at iteration time. A warning message is logged in case statement removal occurs.
        Parameters:
        iterable - the statement Iterable to process
        Returns:
        a statement Iterable that operates rewriting and filtering at iteration time
        See Also:
        Contexts.rewriteAndFilter(Iterable, org.openrdf.model.ValueFactory, Resource, com.google.common.base.Predicate, String)

        public void add(Iterable<? extends org.openrdf.model.Statement> statements,
       org.openrdf.model.Resource... contexts)
         throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Delegates to wrapped transaction. Delegates after having modified the supplied parameters, in order to: (1) avoid writing to inferred contexts and (2) add statements to the null context replacement instead of the null context.
        Specified by:
        add in interface Transaction
        Overrides:

        public void remove(Iterable<? extends org.openrdf.model.Statement> statements,
          org.openrdf.model.Resource... contexts)
            throws org.openrdf.repository.RepositoryException
        Delegates to wrapped transaction. Delegates after having modified the supplied parameters, in order to: (1) avoid removing statements from inferred contexts and (2) re-target the operation from the null context to its replacement context.
        Specified by:
